EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - Join Us Tomorrow at NBAA - GoDirect Cocktail Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
NBAA Business Aviation Convention and Exhibition <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pi9KZRAjkPU]]> DearÂ {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}
We are pleased to invite you to a cocktail reception hosted by Honeywell GoDirect during NBAA in the Honeywell booth. Stop by and enjoy appetizers and refreshments as a way to say thank you for your business and to meet members of our team.
Date: Tuesday, October 10, 2017
Location:
Las Vegas Convention Center Booth # N5100
Time: 6:00 - 7:00 p.m. (Immediately following the show)
Click {{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}} to add this event in your calendar.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow.
Best Regards,
Jason Wissink Sr. Sales Director GoDirect Services Honeywell Aerospace
